    • getAuthToken

      public String getAuthToken()
      Getter for the authorization token used to access the Ship24 API.
      Returns:

    • create

      public static Ship24 create(String auth_token) throws AuthTokenException
      Factory method to create a new Ship24 object.
      Parameters:
      auth_token - The authorization token to use when accessing the Ship24 API.
      Returns:
      A new Ship24 object.
      Throws:
      AuthTokenException - If the provided authorization token is null or invalid.

    • getAllCouriers

      public List<Courier> getAllCouriers() throws IOException, InvalidTrackingNumberError
      Retrieves a list of all available courier services from the Ship24 API.
      Returns:
      A list of all available couriers.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is a problem with the HTTP request.
      InvalidTrackingNumberError - If the tracking number is invalid.

    • createTracking

      public Tracker createTracking(String trackingNumber) throws org.json.JSONException, InvalidTrackingNumberError, IOException
      Creates a new tracking with the provided tracking number and courier code, if any.
      Parameters:
      trackingNumber - the tracking number of the package to be tracked
      Returns:
      the Tracker object containing information about the created tracking
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error with the JSON response
      InvalidTrackingNumberError - if the tracking number is invalid or the response contains errors
      IOException - if there is an error with the HTTP request

    • createTracking

      public Tracker createTracking(String trackingNumber, String[] courierCode) throws org.json.JSONException, InvalidTrackingNumberError, IOException
      Creates a new tracking with the provided tracking number and courier code, if any.
      Parameters:
      trackingNumber - the tracking number of the package to be tracked
      courierCode - the courier code of the package to be tracked
      Returns:
      the Tracker object containing information about the created tracking
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error with the JSON response
      InvalidTrackingNumberError - if the tracking number is invalid or the response contains errors
      IOException - if there is an error with the HTTP request

    • getTrackings

      public ArrayList<Tracking> getTrackings(String trackingNumber) throws org.json.JSONException, InvalidTrackingNumberError, IOException
      Gets a list of Trackings with the provided tracking number.
      Parameters:
      trackingNumber - the tracking number of the package to be tracked
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Tracking objects containing information about the package
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error with the JSON response
      InvalidTrackingNumberError - if the tracking number is invalid or the response contains errors
      IOException - if there is an error with the HTTP request

    • getTracking

      public Tracking getTracking(String trackingNumber) throws org.json.JSONException, InvalidTrackingNumberError, IOException
      Gets a tracking with the provided tracking number.
      Parameters:
      trackingNumber - the tracking number of the package to be tracked
      Returns:
      a Tracking objects containing information about the package
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error with the JSON response
      InvalidTrackingNumberError - if the tracking number is invalid or the response contains errors
      IOException - if there is an error with the HTTP request

    • listExistingTrackers

      public List<Tracker> listExistingTrackers(int page, int limit) throws org.json.JSONException, InvalidTrackingNumberError, IOException
      List all the trackers that have been created by this account.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to retrieve (default 1).
      limit - the number of trackers to retrieve per page (default 50).
      Returns:
      a list of trackers.
      Throws:
      InvalidTrackingNumberError - if there is an error communicating with the API.
      IOException - if there is an error communicating with the API.
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error parsing the JSON response from the API.
